meanings.sent1: The hunter admired the soft foxskin he had just obtained.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful foxskin coat to keep warm in the winter.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fox tried to steal back his own foxskin from the trapper.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sleek as a foxskin, hiding her true intentions.
meanings.sent5: The foxskin felt like a cloud against his fingertips, a reminder of the wild creature it once belonged to.

meanings.definition: A garment made from the skin of a fox.
meanings.sent1: The foxskin draped elegantly over her shoulders, catching the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: He purchased a foxskin vest at the market to add to his collection.
meanings.sent3: The fashion show featured a unique foxskin dress that turned heads.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as sharp as a foxskin, cutting through the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The foxskin cloak whispered tales of the forest as she walked through the city streets.
